text: Ann Shulgin (March 22, 1931 – July 9, 2022)Ruhe in Frieden, Ann Shulgin was an American author. She was the wife of chemist Alexander Shulgin. She wrote PiHKAL and TiHKAL with her husband. ==References== ==Other websites== * Erowid Character Vaults: Ann Shulgin * Ann Shulgin dedica la traducción al español de PIHKAL y TIHKAL (In Spanish) * A New Class of Criminals: A therapist laments the loss to science of MDMA * Video: Psychedelic Psychotherapy with MDMA – Ann Shulgin: A Chemical Performance * Transform Press – Publisher of Ann Shulgin's Books Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:New Zealand writers Category:People from Wellington
title: Ann Shulgin
